scripts.clean: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d && docker-compose exec web rake db:create db:migrate && sleep 10 && docker-compose ps
scripts.demo:1: docker-compose exec web rails r "Coordinator.create!(email: 'grace.c.youngblood@gmail.com', name: 'Grace C Youngblood', password_digest: BCrypt::Password.create('password'), uuid: SecureRandom.uuid)"
scripts.demo: yarn run clean && yarn run demo:1 && yarn run demo:2 && yarn run demo:3 && yarn run demo:4
scripts.credential:practitioner: echo 'Requested: a command that will create credentials for a coordinator
scripts.credential:patient: echo 'Requested: a command that will create credentials for patient
scripts.credentials: yarn run demo; and dc exec web rails r 'puts "Coordinator: #{Coordinator.first.uuid}"; puts "Participant: #{Participant.first.uuid}"'
